clientId.title: OAuth Client ID
clientId.description: OAuth client ID for Yoto API authentication. The default works for most users. Only change if you've created your own OAuth app at yoto.dev.

accessToken.title: Access Token
accessToken.description: Automatically managed by the authentication flow. Do not edit manually.

refreshToken.title: Refresh Token
refreshToken.description: Automatically managed by the authentication flow. Do not edit manually.

tokenExpiresAt.title: Token Expiration
tokenExpiresAt.description: Automatically managed by the authentication flow. Do not edit manually.

items.helpvalue:
Authentication Instructions:

  1. Click the "Start Authentication" button in the custom UI above
  2. Follow the on-screen instructions to authorize with your Yoto account
  3. Tokens will be saved automatically when authorization completes
  4. Homebridge will restart and connect to your devices

Advanced: The default OAuth Client ID works for all users. The token fields below are automatically managed by the plugin and should not be edited manually.
